sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均可表示"外部的"之意。
means: external ： 指与其他物体分离或没有关系的外部，不涉及内容，只说明全然是外部的。
exterior ： 强调位于事物的外表以上，但仍是该事物的一部分，较正式。
outer ： 主要提离开中心或内部较远的，或指比较在外的。
outside ： 指超出某种界限之外的。
outward ： 多指空间关系或方向上向外的。

sentence.Network_en: The President's unescorted vehicle was ambushed just outside the capital.
sentence.Network_cn: 刚出首都，总统无人护卫的汽车就遭到了伏击。

sentence.Network_en: There was a scream of brakes from the carriageway outside.
sentence.Network_cn: 外面车行道上传来刺耳的刹车声。

sentence.Network_en: The outside air was heavy and moist and sultry.
sentence.Network_cn: 外面的空气沉滞、潮湿而闷热。

lj.lj_ly: every minute, or at the outside, every ninety seconds.
we'll get outside of a feed of bacon and egg.
lj.lj_ls: 我们要吃一顿咸肉和鸡蛋。

jx.jx_en_mean: away from or not belonging to a particular circle or institution
(of a person) excluded from a group or activity
(informal, chiefly N. Amer.)beyond the boundaries of

lj.lj_ly: a village 20 miles outside of New York.

means.word_mean: 外面的,在外面的,表面上的

entry.def: The outside of something is the part which surrounds or encloses the rest of it.

example.ex: ...the outside of the building...
example.tran: 建筑物的外部

example.ex: Cook over a fairly high heat until the outsides are browned.
example.tran: 用大火烹调至表面焦黄。

entry.tran: 在外面；在室外；在建筑物近旁
entry.def: If you are outside, you are not inside a building but are quite close to it.

example.ex: 'Was the car inside the garage?' — 'No, it was still outside.'...
example.tran: “车在车库里吗？”——“不，还在外面。”

example.ex: I stepped outside and pulled up my collar against the cold mist...
example.tran: 我走出门，竖起衣领抵御冷雾。

entry.def: If you are outside a room, you are not in it but are in the passage or area next to it.

example.ex: She'd sent him outside the classroom...
example.tran: 她让他到教室外面去。

example.ex: He stood in the narrow hallway just outside the door.
example.tran: 他就站在门外狭窄的走廊里。

entry.def: When you talk about the outside world, you are referring to things that happen or exist in places other than your own home or community.

example.ex: ...a side of Morris's character she hid carefully from the outside world...
example.tran: 莫里斯小心隐藏不让外人知晓的性格中的一面

example.ex: It's important to have outside interests.
example.tran: 培养一些业余爱好很重要。

entry.def: People or things outside a country, town, or region are not in it.

example.ex: ...an old castle outside Budapest...
example.tran: 布达佩斯城外的古堡

example.ex: The number of warships stationed outside European waters roughly doubled.
example.tran: 部署在欧洲水域之外的战舰数量差不多增加了一倍。

entry.tran: （车道）靠近路中间的，快车道的
entry.def: On a road with two separate carriageways, the outside lanes are the ones which are closest to its centre.

example.ex: It was travelling in the outside lane at 78mph.
example.tran: 它正以78英里的时速在快车道上疾驶。

entry.def: Outside people or organizations are not part of a particular organization or group.

example.ex: The company now makes much greater use of outside consultants.
example.tran: 该公司现在对外聘顾问的利用更加充分。

example.ex: ...church services given on Sundays by outside chaplains.
example.tran: 外请牧师主持的星期天礼拜仪式

entry.def: Outside a particular institution or field of activity means in other fields of activity or in general life.

example.ex: The condition is practically unknown outside psychiatry clinics.
example.tran: 除了医院的精神病科外，这种病几乎不为人知。

example.ex: ...the largest merger ever to take place outside the oil industry.
example.tran: 石油行业之外发生的一起有史以来规模最大的并购

entry.def: Something that is outside a particular range of things is not included within it.

example.ex: She is a beautiful boat, but way, way outside my price range...
example.tran: 这条船很漂亮，但价格却远远超出我能承受的范围。

example.ex: When Cathy sings about love, you feel that she's singing about something outside her experience.
example.tran: 凯茜在唱情歌的时候，你能感觉到她没有这方面的体验。

entry.def: Something that happens outside a particular period of time happens at a different time from the one mentioned.

example.ex: They are open outside normal daily banking hours.
example.tran: 它们在银行正常营业时间以外开放。

example.ex: ...nor does it help if your job involves working outside normal office hours.
example.tran: 工作需要加班也会有害。

entry.def: Outside of is used to introduce the only thing or person that prevents your main statement from being completely true.

example.ex: Every single relationship I've had with a man, outside of my husband, has ended in disaster.
example.tran: 除了我丈夫之外，我与所有男人的感情都以悲剧收场。

entry.def: You use at the outside to say that you think that a particular amount is the largest possible in a particular situation, or that a particular time is the latest possible time for something to happen.

example.ex: Give yourself forty minutes at the outside.
example.tran: 最多给自己留40分钟。

means.word_mean: 1. the region that is outside of something
2. the outer side or surface of something
1. relating to or being on or near the outer side or limit;

sentences.sentence: "extraneous light in the camera spoiled the photograph"

means.word_mean: 3. originating or belonging beyond some bounds:"the outside world";
4. located, suited for, or taking place in the open air;

sentences.sentence: "a beautiful outdoor setting for the wedding"

means.word_mean: 5. functioning outside the boundaries or precincts of an organized unit;
6. leading to or from the outside;
10. on or toward an outer edge;
11. (of a baseball pitch) on the far side of home plate from the batter;

auth_sentence.content: Indeed, physicists simply camped outside the auditorium instead.
auth_sentence.res_content: Indeed, physicists simply camped outside the auditorium instead.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Indeed, physicists simply camped outside the auditorium instead.

auth_sentence.content: Hayley reporting from outside the BBC's new offices.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hayley reporting from outside the BBC's new offices.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hayley reporting from outside the BBC's new offices.

auth_sentence.content: Want to know if it is still daylight outside?
auth_sentence.res_content: Want to know if it is still daylight outside?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Want to know if it is still daylight outside?

stems_affixes.value_cn: 值得考虑的, 相当可观的
stems_affixes.word_buile: consider[v.考虑,细想;体谅,顾及;认为,把…看作]+able能……的→adj.值得考虑的, 相当可观的
consider考虑+ate……的→考虑到的
side旁边→n.边, 旁边, 面;adj.旁边的, 侧面的
in进入+side边→adj.&n.&adv.里面[的,地],内部[的,地]
out外面+side边→adj.&n.&adv.外面[的,地],外部[的,地]
considerable[adj.值得考虑的, 相当可观的]+ly表副词→considerably相当地
preside[v.[at,over]主持]+ent人→主持[的人]
preside主持+ium地方或团体→n.主席团
reside[v.居住,驻扎;属于]+nce→n.住处,住宅
considerate[adj.考虑周到的,体谅的]+ion表名词→consideration体谅, 考虑
side旁边→n.边, 旁边, 面;adj.旁边的, 侧面的
side旁边+way路→n.小路, 小巷,人行道
sub下+side坐→坐下去→平息
super在……上面+sede=side坐→坐上去→淘汰[以前的东西]

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"出去.过时,外面"; 2. 表示"超过.过度"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 室外的, 户外的, 野外的
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+door门→adj.室外的, 户外的, 野外的
out出去.过时,外面+er→adj.外部的,外面的,外层的
out出去.过时,外面+going走→走出来→心胸宽→待人友善的
out出去.过时,外面+land地+ish……的→外地来的→奇异的
out出去.过时,外面+ward方向→向外的
out超过.过度+size范围→范围超出
out超过.过度+standing标准的→adj.突出的, 显著的
out出去.过时,外面→adv.出外;在外 v.公布
out出去.过时,外面+door户+s→n.户外 adv.在户外, 在野外
out出去.过时,外面+side旁边→在外边
out出去.过时,外面+ward方向→向外的
out出去.过时,外面+break中断→事情断裂→爆发
out出去.过时,外面+door户+s→n.户外 adv.在户外, 在野外
out出去.过时,外面+flow流→流出

stems_affixes.value_cn: 外出, 旅行, 散步
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+ing状态→n.外出, 旅行, 散步
out出去.过时,外面+let表名词→n.出口, 出路
out出去.过时,外面+line线条→划出线条→大纲

stems_affixes.value_cn: 景色, 风光, 观点
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+look看→n.景色, 风光, 观点

stems_affixes.value_cn: 产量, 输出, 输出量
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+put放,摆→放出,输出→产量
out出去.过时,外面+rage怒气→怒气外露→粗暴
out出去.过时,外面+set安置好→在外面放置好→开端
out出去.过时,外面+skirt裙子;引申为城市周边+s→郊区
out出去.过时,外面+work工作→户外工作;在工作上胜过
out超过.过度+law法律→超越法律之人
out出去.过时,外面→adv.出外;在外 v.公布
out出去.过时,外面+flow流→流出
out出去.过时,外面+work工作→户外工作;在工作上胜过
out超过.过度+bid出价→出价超出
out超过.过度+do做→做得超出别人
out超过.过度+live活→超过别人活着
out超过.过度+number数量→v.在数量上超过
out超过.过度+wear穿→穿出了[洞]
out超过.过度+wit智慧→机智超出别人

Sentence.sentence: Last September the couple moved into a 1,500-square-foot home in Premier Gardens, a subdivision of 95 "zero-energy homes"(ZEH) just outside town.
It could remain there for years and, often forgotten, never reach the outside world.
If you hear that yours isn't doing well in math, or see them sitting outside the dean's office, it's like a personal failure.

a parent, relative, friend, or doctor outside the family, had higher self-esteem, higher grades, and lower substance use than peers whose role models were sports figures, singers, or other media characters.
They say that they are drawn to the prospect of learning applications outside the classroom, though such lesson plans have yet to surface
University officials claim that they dole out iPhones and iPods so as to facilitate students' learning outside of class.

sentences.en: It's quite dark outside, there's no moon.
sentences.cn: 外面很黑, 没有月亮。

sentences.en: Wilson was waiting for him outside.
Please let us in, it's cold outside.
sentences.cn: 请让我们进去吧, 外面很冷。

sentences.en: The door was locked on the outside.
One should not judge a thing by the outside.
sentences.cn: 不能从外表来判断事物。

sentences.en: He was annoyed with complaints made from outside.
sentences.cn: 他因外界的种种怨言而感到烦恼。

means.word_mean: 外部的, 在外面的, 对着外面的

sentences.en: All the outside doors have locks.
sentences.cn: 所有外面的门都上了锁。

means.word_mean: 不在主建筑物内的; 外面的

sentences.en: Work went on as usual inside, uninterrupted by outside repairs.
sentences.cn: 外部装修, 内部照常营业。

means.word_mean: 集团外的, 组织外的, 外界的, 局外的

sentences.cn: 他们需要来自外界的帮助。

sentences.en: There's just an outside chance we'll get the contract after all.
sentences.cn: 说到底, 我们得到那份合同的希望极其渺茫。

means.word_mean: 可能性最大的, 最可能的

sentences.en: You'll have to do it outside office hours.
sentences.cn: 你得在上班以外的时间做这件事。

sentences.en: The matter is outside my area of the responsibility.
sentences.cn: 此事超出我的责任范围。

sentences.en: Outside Tom she has no real friends.
sentences.cn: 她除了汤姆之外没有真正的朋友。

jushi.english: Certainly I parked outside your door.
jushi.chinese: 没错,我曾在你门口停过车。

jushi.english: Wilson was waiting for him outside.
Please let us in, it's cold outside.
jushi.chinese: 请让我们进去吧,外面很冷。
